definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: It is legal to stay in China only after you have the valid Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 留學生持居留許可在華居住方屬合法。

sentences.english: Apologies should not be about permission to us to forgive someone.
sentences.chinese: 道歉不應該成爲我們寬恕別人的許可證。

sentences.english: On the Nature of Administrative License.
The facility should have a process waste water discharge permit.
sentences.chinese: 受核工廠須領有加工廠廢水排放許可證。

sentences.english: This class can only be taken with the professor's approval.
sentences.chinese: 這個課必須要有教授的許可纔可以修。

sentences.english: See if cell-phone searches without a warrant should be illegal.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解下是否沒有許可證進行手機搜索是合法的。

sentences.english: Read your software contracts, and make sure you understand your licensing rights.
sentences.chinese: 仔細閱讀軟件合同，確保你明白了享有的許可權。

sentences.english: As usual, the code will be released under an open source license.
sentences.chinese: 照常，代碼將遵循開放源碼許可證發佈。

sentences.english: Run time and designer licenses are included in all three editions.
sentences.chinese: 這三個版本中都包含運行時和設計者許可證。

sentences.english: Even the children had to knock on the door for permission to go to the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 就連孩子們也得敲他們的們才能獲得許可去廁所。

sentences.english: You must get a permit if you want to keep a gun.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想持有一支槍，你必須弄一張許可證。

sentences.english: You cannot be transferred to another employer or employment without the approval of the CLA.
sentences.chinese: 您未經勞委會許可不得轉換僱主及工作。

sentences.english: PEOPLE , its original authors or licensors.
sentences.chinese: 原作者或其許可方所有。

sentences.english: Launch the installer and accept the license agreement.
sentences.chinese: 啓動安裝程序並接受許可協議。

sentences.english: The period of effectiveness an authorizing contract may not exceed 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 許可合同的有效期限一次不得超過十年。

sentences.english: The Permit Holder shall provide portable toilet for the on- site construction workforce.
sentences.chinese: 許可證持有人須爲駐工地建築工人提供流動洗手間。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
